# accounts

**Instance Property**

The accounts managed by this account store.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var accounts: NSArray! { get }
```

## Getting Accounts

- **account(withIdentifier:)**: Returns the account with the specified identifier.
- **accounts(with:)**: Returns all accounts of the specified type.

items.description: Returns the account with the specified identifier.
items.name: account(withIdentifier:)

items.description: Returns all accounts of the specified type.
items.name: accounts(with:)
